physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 14 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on the back of the photograph: ''#56 Greeley Colorado Businesses; A. Winograd, Poultry; Samuel Pinsky, Coal, Hay and Feed; Montifiore J. Moses Real Estate and Insurance, In Creede, Later in Greeley, Donated by: Mrs. Eleanor Judd.''

mods.abstract: Three photographs of Greeley, Colorado businesses. The upper left photograph shows an exterior view of Abe Winograd's poultry business. Painted on the building is ''Poultry wanted at all times'' and pictures of a hen and a rooster. The photograph below shows an exterior view Samuel Pinsky's Coal, Hay, and Feed business. Samuel Pinsky is seated in the driver's seat of a wagon loaded with coal. Main photograph, two men sit in the interior of Montifiore J. Moses' Real Estate and Insurance Co. The business was originally in Creede, Colorado and then in Greeley, Colorado.

name.namePart: Montifiore J. Moses' real Estate and Insurance Co.
